CustomField.formula:
IF(ISPICKVAL(Department__c, "CSE") && Engineering_Mathematics_I__c >= 40 && Programming_in_C_and_Data_structures__c >= 40, "Pass", IF(Engineering_Mathematics_I__c < 40 || Programming_in_C_and_Data_structures__c <40,"Fail",
IF(ISPICKVAL(Department__c, "ECE") && Optical_Fiber_Communication__c >= 40 && Network_Analysis__c >= 40, "Pass", IF (Optical_Fiber_Communication__c < 40 || Network_Analysis__c<40,"Fail",
IF(ISPICKVAL(Department__c,"CE") && Surveying__c >= 40 && Structural_Analysis__c >= 40, "Pass", IF(Surveying__c <40 || Structural_Analysis__c <40,"Fail",
IF(ISPICKVAL(Department__c, "EE") && Electric_Circuits__c >= 40 && Management_and_Entrepreneurship__c >= 40, "Pass", IF(Electric_Circuits__c <40 || Management_and_Entrepreneurship__c <40,"Fail",
IF(ISPICKVAL(Department__c, "ME") && Solid_Mechanics__c >= 40 && Fluid_Mechanics__c >= 40, "Pass", IF(Solid_Mechanics__c <40 || Fluid_Mechanics__c <40,"Fail","Yet to Update"))))))))))
CustomField.label: Engineering First Semester Result
